page.title: 20Young Adventurers in Sidcup.
page.content: Two local lads after a tough selection trial weekend in Kent, were picked to become{"Operation Raleigh" venturers. Studying meteorology in New Zealand , is what{19 year old Richard Boughey will be doing next summer.Building a raft and racing it is one of the tasks that Richard had to carry out at the trial in Rochester as well as proving his fitness and initiative to selectors. { 20 year old David Weavers'}trial involved humping Landrovers about and cooking rabbit in the middle of the night.Next year David will be diving for hidden treasure at the Great Barrier Reef as well as studying Aboriginal rock paintings in a tropical rain forest. However they both need to find Â£2000 sponsorship by next year.
